pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Annotation of Rice (Oryza Sativa L.spp.japonica) // Gene annotation of rice (Oryza Sativa L.spp.japonica). The package is based on the annotation file from the website http://plants.ensembl.org/Oryza_sativa/Info/Index. Input gene's name then return some information, including the from position, the end position, the position type and the chromosome number.
